verses.verse: דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִיכָה֙ <S%H4318><s%> that came to Micah הַמֹּ֣רַשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H4183><s%> the Morasthite בִּימֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> in the days יוֹתָ֛ם <S%H3147><s%> of Jotham אָחָ֥ז <S%H271><s%> Ahaz יְחִזְקִיָּ֖ה <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> kings יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which חָזָ֥ה <S%H2372><s%> which he saw עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning שֹׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8111><s%> concerning Samaria וִירֽוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem

שִׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> Hear עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> all ye people כֻּלָּ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> all הַקְשִׁ֖יבִי <S%H7181><s%> hearken אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> O earth וּמְלֹאָ֑הּ <S%H4393><s%> and all that therein וִיהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become אֲדֹנָ֨י <S%H136><s%> is and let the Lord יְהוִ֤ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD בָּכֶם֙ לְעֵ֔ד <S%H5707><s%> be witness אֲדֹנָ֖י <S%H136><s%> against you the Lord מֵהֵיכַ֥ל <S%H1964><s%> temple קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> from his holy

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> For behold the LORD יֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> cometh forth מִמְּקוֹמ֑וֹ <S%H4725><s%> out of his place וְיָרַ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> and will come down וְדָרַ֖ךְ <S%H1869><s%> and tread עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and [בָּמֹותֵי כ] (בָּ֥מֳתֵי <S%H1116><s%> height ק) אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

וְנָמַ֤סּוּ <S%H4549><s%> shall be molten הֶֽהָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> And the mountains תַּחְתָּ֔יו <S%H8478><s%> under וְהָעֲמָקִ֖ים <S%H6010><s%> under him and the valleys יִתְבַּקָּ֑עוּ <S%H1234><s%> shall be cleft כַּדּוֹנַג֙ <S%H1749><s%> as wax מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire כְּמַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> [and] as the waters מֻגָּרִ֥ים <S%H5064><s%> [that are] poured בְּמוֹרָֽד׃ <S%H4174><s%> down a steep place

בְּפֶ֤שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> For the transgression יַֽעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All זֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> and for וּבְחַטֹּ֖אות <S%H2403><s%> [is] all this and for the sins בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> What פֶ֣שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> What [is] the transgression יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob הֲלוֹא֙ <S%H3808><s%> not שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> Samaria וּמִי֙ <S%H4310><s%> What בָּמ֣וֹת <S%H1116><s%> is the high יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah הֲל֖וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem

וְשַׂמְתִּ֥י <S%H7760><s%> Therefore I will make שֹׁמְר֛וֹן <S%H8111><s%> Samaria לְעִ֥י <S%H5856><s%> as an heap הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field לְמַטָּ֣עֵי <S%H4302><s%> [and] as plantings כָ֑רֶם <S%H3754><s%> of a vineyard וְהִגַּרְתִּ֤י <S%H5064><s%> and I will pour down לַגַּי֙ <S%H1516><s%> thereof into the valley אֲבָנֶ֔יהָ <S%H68><s%> the stones וִיסֹדֶ֖יהָ <S%H3247><s%> the foundations אֲגַלֶּֽה׃ <S%H1540><s%> and I will discover

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All פְּסִילֶ֣יהָ <S%H6456><s%> And all the graven images יֻכַּ֗תּוּ <S%H3807><s%> thereof shall be beaten to pieces וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֶתְנַנֶּ֙יהָ֙ <S%H868><s%> and all the hires יִשָּׂרְפ֣וּ <S%H8313><s%> thereof shall be burned בָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> with the fire וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲצַבֶּ֖יהָ <S%H6091><s%> and all the idols אָשִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> thereof will I lay שְׁמָמָ֑ה <S%H8077><s%> desolate כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵאֶתְנַ֤ן <S%H868><s%> [it] of the hire זוֹנָה֙ <S%H2181><s%> of an harlot קִבָּ֔צָה <S%H6908><s%> for she gathered וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> and to אֶתְנַ֥ן <S%H868><s%> to the hire זוֹנָ֖ה <S%H2181><s%> of an harlot יָשֽׁוּבוּ׃ <S%H7725><s%> and they shall return

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Because זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> must אֶסְפְּדָ֣ה <S%H5594><s%> Therefore I will wail וְאֵילִ֔ילָה <S%H3213><s%> and howl אֵילְכָ֥ה <S%H1980><s%> go [שִׁילַל כ] (שֹׁולָ֖ל <S%H7758><s%> spoiled ק) וְעָר֑וֹם <S%H6174><s%> and naked אֶעֱשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> I will make מִסְפֵּד֙ <S%H4553><s%> a wailing כַּתַּנִּ֔ים <S%H8577><s%> like the dragons וְאֵ֖בֶל <S%H60><s%> and mourning כִּבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> first יַעֲנָֽה׃ <S%H3284><s%> the ostriches

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנוּשָׁ֖ה <S%H605><s%> [is] incurable מַכּוֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H4347><s%> For her wound כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֙אָה֙ <S%H935><s%> for it is come עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> unto Judah נָגַ֛ע <S%H5060><s%> he is come עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> unto the gate עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> of my people עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> [even] to Jerusalem

בְּגַת֙ <S%H1661><s%> ye [it] not at Gath אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּגִּ֔ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> Declare בָּכ֖וֹ <S%H1058><s%> weep אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּבְכּ֑וּ <S%H1058><s%> ye not at all בְּבֵ֣ית לְעַפְרָ֔ה <S%H1036><s%> in the house of Aphrah עָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> thyself in the dust [הִתְפַּלָּשְׁתִּי כ] (הִתְפַּלָּֽשִׁי׃ <S%H6428><s%> roll self ק)

עִבְרִ֥י <S%H5674><s%> Pass ye away לָכֶ֛ם יוֹשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> thou inhabitant שָׁפִ֖יר <S%H8208><s%> of Saphir עֶרְיָה־ <S%H6181><s%> naked בֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> having thy shame לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> does not יָֽצְאָה֙ <S%H3318><s%> came not forth יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitant צַֽאֲנָ֔ן <S%H6630><s%> of Zaanan מִסְפַּד֙ <S%H5594><s%> lament בֵּ֣ית הָאֵ֔צֶל <S%H1018><s%> of Bethezel יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> he shall receive מִכֶּ֖ם <S%H4480><s%> at עֶמְדָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5979><s%> of you his standing

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because חָ֥לָֽה <S%H2470><s%> weak לְט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for good יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> For the inhabitant מָר֑וֹת <S%H4796><s%> of Maroth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because יָ֤רַד <S%H3381><s%> came down רָע֙ <S%H7451><s%> but evil מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God לְשַׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> unto the gate יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

רְתֹ֧ם <S%H7573><s%> bind הַמֶּרְכָּבָ֛ה <S%H4818><s%> the chariot לָרֶ֖כֶשׁ <S%H7409><s%> to the swift beast יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> O thou inhabitant לָכִ֑ישׁ <S%H3923><s%> of Lachish רֵאשִׁ֨ית <S%H7225><s%> she [is] the beginning חַטָּ֥את <S%H2403><s%> of the sin הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לְבַת־ <S%H1323><s%> to the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֥ךְ נִמְצְא֖וּ <S%H4672><s%> were found פִּשְׁעֵ֥י <S%H6588><s%> for the transgressions יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore תִּתְּנִ֣י <S%H5414><s%> Therefore shalt thou give שִׁלּוּחִ֔ים <S%H7964><s%> presents עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> behalf מוֹרֶ֣שֶׁת גַּ֑ת <S%H4182><s%> to Moreshethgath בָּתֵּ֤י <S%H1004><s%> the houses אַכְזִיב֙ <S%H392><s%> of Achzib לְאַכְזָ֔ב <S%H391><s%> [shall be] a lie לְמַלְכֵ֖י <S%H4428><s%> to the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

עֹ֗ד <S%H5750><s%> Moreover הַיֹּרֵשׁ֙ <S%H3423><s%> an heir אָ֣בִי <S%H935><s%> Yet will I bring לָ֔ךְ יוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> unto thee O inhabitant מָֽרֵשָׁ֑ה <S%H4762><s%> of Mareshah עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עֲדֻלָּ֥ם <S%H5725><s%> unto Adullam יָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> he shall come כְּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> the glory יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

קָרְחִ֣י <S%H7139><s%> Make thee bald וָגֹ֔זִּי <S%H1494><s%> and poll עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> children תַּעֲנוּגָ֑יִךְ <S%H8588><s%> thee for thy delicate הַרְחִ֤בִי <S%H7337><s%> enlarge קָרְחָתֵךְ֙ <S%H7144><s%> thy baldness כַּנֶּ֔שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> as the eagle כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because גָל֖וּ <S%H1540><s%> for they are gone into captivity מִמֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at ס
